docs.snippet: Federal officials have warned authorities in New York City, Texas and Virginia about an unspecific threat of attacks by al Qaeda militants around Election Day, putting local law enforcement on alert days before the vote, officials said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal officials have warned authorities in New York City, Texas and Virginia about an unspecific threat of attacks by al Qaeda militants around Election Day, putting local law enforcement on alert days before the vote, officials said on Friday.

headline.main: U.S. Authorities Warn of Al Qaeda Threat to Election

docs.snippet: Outraged claims of voting fraud are no longer only a regular part of elections in unsteady, young democracies — they're increasingly being made in established democratic countries by populist politicians who question the fairness of the voti...
docs.lead_paragraph: Outraged claims of voting fraud are no longer only a regular part of elections in unsteady, young democracies — they're increasingly being made in established democratic countries by populist politicians who question the fairness of the voting process — and with it the validity of representation by and for the people.

headline.main: Claims of Election Fraud Resonate With Growing Audience
headline.print_headline: Claims of Election Fraud Resonate With Growing Audience
